SELECT M.MEM_NO , M.MEM_NAME , M.MEM_GENDER , M.MEM_AGE , M.MEM_REGNO1 , M.MEM_TEL , R.RECEIPT_NO , R.RECEIPT_REASON , H.HISTORY_NO , H.HISTORY_LOC , CD.CODE_NAME , CC.CODE_NAME AS ccodeName FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN PATIENT P ON P.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO INNER JOIN RECEIPT R ON P.PATNT_NO = R.PATNT_NO INNER JOIN EMP E ON E.EMP_NO = R.EMP_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER EM ON EM.MEM_NO = E.MEM_NO INNER JOIN HISTORY H ON H.RECEIPT_NO = R.RECEIPT_NO INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_NO = H.HISTORY_LOC INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.CODE_NO = H.HISTORY_STATUS WHERE R.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND H.HISTORY_LOC IN ((SELECT CLINIC_NO FROM CLINIC WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}),'LOC015') ORDER BY H.HISTORY_LOC

SELECT m.mem_no, m.mem_name, m.mem_gender, m.mem_age, m.mem_regno1, m.mem_tel, p.patnt_no, r.receipt_no, r.receipt_reason, c.code_no, c.code_name, cc.code_name AS ccodeName, ch.chart_no, ch.chart_record FROM member m JOIN patient p ON m.mem_no = p.mem_no JOIN ( SELECT r1.patnt_no, MAX(r1.receipt_no) AS max_receipt_no FROM receipt r1 JOIN history h1 ON h1.receipt_no = r1.receipt_no WHERE r1.emp_no = #{empNo} GROUP BY r1.patnt_no ) max_receipt ON p.patnt_no = max_receipt.patnt_no JOIN receipt r ON max_receipt.max_receipt_no = r.receipt_no JOIN history h ON h.receipt_no = r.receipt_no JOIN common_code c ON c.code_no = h.history_loc JOIN common_code cc ON cc.code_no = h.history_status LEFT JOIN chart ch ON ch.receipt_no = r.receipt_no WHERE m.mem_no = #{memNo}
